subject: Fashion
title: Resale Market Explosion
description: Learn Resale Market Explosion in one minute.

hook.text: A pair of Travis Scott Jordans bought for $175 resells for $2,000.

buildup.text: Platforms like StockX and GOAT turned sneaker resale into a stock exchange.

discovery.text: Authentication services and price charts made resale feel legitimate.

twist.text: Bots buy out drops in seconds, leaving real fans empty-handed.

climax.text: Brands profit from hype but lose control over who actually wears the product.

punchline.text: The resale market is fashion's shadow economy.

quiz.question: What role do bots play in sneaker resale?
options: They buy out limited drops before human shoppers
